content: repeat these two row until you have 40 sts remaining continue knitting only the decrease row until you have 20 stitches remaining divide your stitches onto two needles 10 stitches on each using the stitch markers as the division points the stitch markers show the start and end of each set of 10 remove markers and use kitchener stitch to close the end of the toe weave in all ends block or don t i won t judge and you re done pg 5 pattern copyright sophie skinner 2022 for personal use only colour work charts chart 1 chart 2 pg 6 pattern copyright sophie skinner 2022 for personal use only
